column1: Common Bond Bistro & Bakery - Montrose////This is one of my favorite places to come to when I need my pastry fix! The lines are alwayssss long but it's super worth it
column2: and also gives you time to choose what you want because let's be real...everything looks so good! To be honest
column3: the rest of the menu doesn't appeal to me so I don't ever order brunch/lunch from here.
